conclusion: Analyze the velocity-time graph of two objects, A and B, moving in the same direction from the same initial location.
At t1, object A has a velocity of v0, and object B has a velocity of 0.
Determine the time t2 when their velocities are equal.
At t2, both objects have the same velocity, v0.
Since the objects start moving at the same time, they will meet at t2 where their velocities are equal.
Verify that the objects meet at t2 by checking that both objects have the same velocity at this time.
Conclude that the two objects will meet at t2.
The two objects meet at t2.
